content:
IServiceGroupPartition IServiceGroupPartition Interface

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Service group members inside a service group can cast the provided IStatefulServicePartition or IStatelessServicePartition to a IServiceGroupPartition to access the methods that are specific to members within service groups.

Edit

In this Article

public interface IServiceGroupPartitionPublic Interface IServiceGroupPartition

Methods

ResolveMember<T>(Uri) ResolveMember(Of T)(Uri)

Edit

Enables the member to get direct access to the other members of the service group.

T ResolveMember<T>(Uri name)where T : classFunction ResolveMember(Of T As Class)(name As Uri) As T
Parameters
name
Uri Uri

The fabric:/ name of the member to resolve.

Returns
T T

Returns the member that is specified by name as an object of the specified type.

Remarks

The ResolveMember<T>(Uri) method enables a service group member to obtain a direct reference to the other members in the group. The direct object-object communication with the other members does not require communication outside of the machine or virtual machine, either for communication with the Naming service to resolve the member or via some external transport to send the actual commands to the member.
